thread.title: Hart's Andrew Nielsen up for another national honor
thread.title_full: Hart's Andrew Nielsen up for another national honor

author: Dan Agnew
title: Hart's Andrew Nielsen up for another national honor
text:
Hart's Andrew Nielsen up for another national honor Senior nominated for Kohl's Kicking Camps National Player of the Week Posted: October 13, 2015 3:15 p.m. Updated: October 13, 2015 3:15 p.m. A A A 
Hart High School kicker Andrew Nielsen could potentially earn a national honor for the second straight season. 
The senior was nominated for the Kohl’s Kicking Camps National Player of the Week following his impressive game on Friday in Hart football’s 52-28 win over Canyon.Nielsen hit a 51-yard field goal in the game, while also executing a successful onside kick, punting twice for a 41.5-yard average and nailing all seven of his point-after-touchdown attempts.He’ll be competing for votes with four other candidates for a chance to win this week.This is the second time he’s been nominated for the weekly award by Kohl’s News, which focuses specifically on football kickers, punters and long-snappers around the country.He won the National Player of the Week vote last October after knocking in a school-record 54-yard field goal in a game against Santiago of Corona.Players can be voted for here: http://fans.vote/v/ACjpNSnNuIk
